word_mean: 〔复 mycoplasmas，mycoplasmata〕支原体：为柔膜体纲(Mollicutes)的一种细菌

sentence.Network_en: He ran a lot of tests and it turned out I had an infection called mycoplasma.
sentence.Network_cn: 他进行了多项检查，最后证明我感染了支原体。

sentence.Network_en: The viruses are very simple constructed compared to even a mycoplasma cell.
sentence.Network_cn: 即使与枝原体细胞相比,病毒的结构也是十分简单的.

sentence.Network_en: This applies to most respiratory infections ( e . g . mycoplasma infections, infectious coryza, laryngotracheitis ).
sentence.Network_cn: 大多数呼吸道感染都如此,如支原体感染, 传染性鼻炎, 喉气管炎.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 直接灭菌后丢弃之。, 3、支原体(mycoplasma) 污染的细胞，是否能以肉眼观察出异状？, 不能。除极有经验之专家外，大多数遭受支原体污染的，无法以其外观分辨之。.

means.word_mean: 1. the smallest self-reproducing prokaryote; lacks a cell wall and can survive without oxygen; can cause pneumonia and urinary tract infection
